title: Facebook encryption will create 'lawless' world online, warns agency charged with protecting children worldwide
text:
Facebook will become a "lawless" world where paedophiles will be emboldened to target children if the social media giant goes ahead with encryption, says the head of the agency that leads the worldwide fight against online child abuse.

John Clark, head of the National Center for Missing & Exploited Children (NCMEC), which collects all reports of child abuse from social media, backed warnings by Home Secretary Priti Patel that Facebook’s encryption plans would create a “digital blindspot” where paedophiles and terrorists could hide their crimes.

He revealed 90 per cent of its child abuse reports come from Facebook which meant encryption by the tech giant could see the number of reports it received...
